Articles.Content:
Pro: THIS IS AMAZINGGGGGGG

Con: Die nearly instantly because there's no atmosphere.

The ability to live in any video game universe you wanted.

Pro: meet some... unusual... people.

Con: Eventually die in a power outage, corrupt save file, or glitch.

Becoming superhumanly strong after eating spinach.

Pro:your strong

con:well by barley touching some one you can break there bones ,and when your mad you can bring a whole house down.

Have the ability to build things in amazing time with little to no effort at out of anything I can get my hands on.

Pro:your strong

con:well by barley touching some one you can break there bones ,and when your mad you can bring a whole house down.

Have the ability to build things in amazing time with little to no effort at out of anything I can get my hands on.

Pro: Yay shelter. Con: Against construction laws.

You get space time disrupted every 60 seconds.

Con: Die nearly instantly because there's no atmosphere.

ERROR: Con is invalid. I stated that i would be immune to negative effects, and am therefore able to survive.

Pro: ERROR

Con: ERROR

Be the same way I am.

Pro: Be Designer225

Con: My life has just gone out of the window

Have a brain in a robot body.

Pro: amazing & fun by design

Cons: annoying & boring by design

Add a time relativity, even if infinitesimal, to all equation and keep having fun.

Pro: Be Designer225

Con: My life has just gone out of the window

Have a brain in a robot body.

Edited June 28, 2014 by WinkAllKerb''
too late posting grumpf xD

Pro: you can rewrite the laws of physics to your choosing

Con: may annihilate universe as it would have to reset to new laws

telekinesis

pro: you can make thing move without moving yourself

con: even if it might sound 'spicy' you now get tele'vision and derivatives that don't work as intended at all xD

tele'emphas'is'pat'hi'E

Edited June 29, 2014 by WinkAllKerb''
some weird typo fix xD

Pro: You can understand hard-to-figure words.

Con: No other people can understand what you say.

Be able to fly.

Pro: you can fly

Con: does not mean fly through the air but move really fast and i don't mean like super fast but just fast

make other people less stupid

Pro: Smarter people

Con: More invention, possibly of WOMD, causing extreme war, ending in the worlds destruction.

Own an English robot butler who calls everyone Weasley. +1 Coolness points if you know what that is from.

Edited June 29, 2014 by Prof. Endwalker

Pro: Smarter people

Con: More invention, possibly of WOMD, causing extreme war, ending in the worlds destruction.

Own an English robot butler who calls everyone Weasley. +1 Coolness points if you know what that is from.

Pro: Free butler

Con: Not a mutation.

Farts now smell like butterflies.

Pro: Farts smell like butterflies.

Con: What do butterflies even smell like?

You have the ability to create SRB's out of nothing.

Pro: Farts smell like butterflies.

Con: What do butterflies even smell like?

You have the ability to create SRB's out of nothing.

Pro. Moaaaaaar bostaaaaars.

Con: Loss of control turns all matter in the univers into boosters.

Pro: Not being a mutant.

Con: You don't have any superpowers.

The ability to absorb, store, and release electricity (at any amperage or voltage you want) with no harm to yourself.

Pro: You are now the electric monster!

Con: Frankenstein

Be a Frankenstein.

Pro:your strong nothing else i could say

con:everyone will freak out ,and be scared of you.

Ability to create all kinds of clocks by scratch.

pro: you can make clocks from scratch

con: no one is impressed as they would rather look at there phones for the time

the ability to absorb and redirect radiation without harm to myself

No.

Control your cells.

pro: you got fyreflare answering wich is always cool

con: you got a watch dog on fire

the ability not to be under any kind of control even something unable to know it's own existence while controlling you anyway. (plik plak plok)

Pro: Freedom

Con: ....No Con? BEST MUTATION EVAR.

The ability to control radiation without getting hurt

(Fyre Flare if you just say no instead of actually playing the game, so help me god i will remove you from my friends list in 0.13 seconds!)

Pro: Surviving the nuclear apocalypse as well as being able to create radiation-free zones.

Con: Being ground up into a powder used as ultra-light radiation absorber.

The ability to cause Chicken and soybean curd to taste the same as any meat other than chicken.
